long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension enables users to use Trubot Designer app to record their web activities and play it back as a bot. The extension lets the app to access information related to web elements (like XPath). It can also be used to fetch information displayed on the webpage. 

This extension is part of a solution and only works together with TruBot Desiner 4.6  and newer. To install Trubot Designer, visit https://trubot.datamatics.com/trubot-free-trial-download you will require manual assistance for installation and activation.
